item.title: Goodbye to these bills: Walmart announces that it will not accept these dollars starting in November - AS USA
item.description:
1. Goodbye to these bills: Walmart announces that it will not accept these dollars starting in November  AS USA
  2. Goodbye forever to this bills at Walmart – They will no longer accept them from now on  El Adelantado de Segovia
  3. Goodbye to paying with these dollar bills: Return them or you will lose money  ECOticias
  4. Say goodbye to these dollar bills this November - They will no longer be accepted at any store starting today  La Grada EN
  5. US Federal Reserve: $50 bills will no longer be accepted in banks and ATMs from this date  Infoemplea2
